item.description:
NEW STUFF:
Every now and then this happens... I have to change movies 2 days before the meetup. Prince of Persia's been out for a few weeks and it looks like it's getting bumped for the 8-hour Twilight-athon that AMC is planning (all 3 movies starting at 6:30 on Tuesday night for $30). I would have been totally into this (natch!) if I hadn't already scheduled a meetup for this Tuesday.

SO....

Prince got bumped to one showing that day -- at 4:20. Most of you will still be in work at that time, so I think that won't work out so well!

Knight and Day with Cameron Diaz and Tom Cruise, however, will show lots of times since it's a new movie. So we're gonna head for the 7:20 show, let's meet at 6:50 either right inside or right outside the ticket lobby. Here's the summary:

A woman is caught between a covert agent and those he claims set him up. As their globetrotting adventure erupts into a maze of double-crosses, close escapes, false identities, and head-spinning romantic snafus, they come to realize that all they can count on is each other.

If you want to see the Twilight trifecta, you're more than welcome to do that, too. I cannot, however, offer discount tickets for it, as it's a special promotion by the theater and they won't let me. Sorry!

Hope to see you for Knight and Day!

--Dana



OLD STUFF:
Prince of Persia looks like a good ol'-fashioned summer blockbuster. Don't get caught up in the accents, but the special effects should be incredible. Come be blown away by Jake Gyllenhaal, Ben Kingsley and Alfred Molina!


SUMMARY:
Set in the mystical lands of Persia, a rogue prince reluctantly joins forces with a mysterious princess and together, they race against dark forces to safeguard an ancient dagger capable of releasing the Sands of Time - a gift from the gods that can reverse time and allow its possessor to rule the world.



THE USUAL STUFF:
We'll meet right inside the theater ticket lobby doors and then I can buy us all discounted tickets ($8.00 each for FMM members and their guests). I also have $3 vouchers each for small sodas and small popcorns (can be used towards a larger size). Exact change makes me like you more.

As always, guests are welcome, just be sure to include them in the RSVP so that I know who/how many to expect.

Please keep your RSVP as up-to-date as possible. And please call me if you're going to be late or need to change your RSVP after I close RSVPs on the site (2 hours before we meet). My cell is: 508/308-4897. I'm also good for directions if you get lost.

After the movie, we'll head to Unos to chat about the movie (and just chat). I'll bring the coupons.

I'll update the time a few days before the meetup, so keep an eye on your email!

Hope to see you for Prince of Persia!

--Dana
508/308-4897
item.name: Knight and Day, was Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time
